snippet: Here is a proposal for a new holiday, observed on Dec. 11, when people take a moment to make sure they’re doing enough to protect themselves from investment fraud.
abstract: Paul Sullivan Wealth Matters column proposes new holiday, observed on Dec 11, when people take a moment to think about ways to protect themselves from investment fraud.
lead_paragraph: Here is a proposal for a new holiday, observed on Dec. 11, when people take a moment to make sure they’re doing enough to protect themselves from investment fraud.
